title: Aussie Streaming Guide: The Best TV & Movies for November 2024
description: Nothing but the finest content to binge stream. All the best TV series, movies, comedy specials, docos, and more!
author: Adam Mathew
excerpt: Nothing but the finest content to binge stream. All the best TV series, movies, comedy specials, docos, and more!
text: The must-watches on Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video, Apple TV+, Stan and Binge!Somehow, it's already November. This means you and I are short-time for two things—hopefully, an abundance of time off to watch TV and an influx of cheesy Christmas Specials. Beyond my hopes for seasonal cheeziness, I'm just going to do what I always do—hook you up with every single critically acclaimed film, addictive TV series, and surprisingly awesome original content worth watching. Below are the top picks from thousands of hours of content from Australia's six major streaming networks. Make your plans. Pop your corn. Enjoy peak binge action.Table of ContentsFoxtel/BingeNetflixDisney+Apple TV+Amazon Prime VideoStanNew in October on Foxtel and BingeTV litter pick: The Day of the Jackal – Nov 7 : In the 1960s in France, members of the French Foreign Legion hire a man who agrees to kill the heavily guarded President Charles de Gaulle for gain. The French cops sniff around to nab him.Movie litter pick: Abigail – Nov 10 : A group of would-be criminals kidnaps the 12-year-old daughter of a powerful underworld figure. Holding her for ransom in an isolated mansion, their plan starts to unravel when they discover their young captive is something else.What notable movies are coming to Binge?Golda – Nov 1Abigail – Nov 10Surveilled – Nov 21The Fall Guy – Nov 30What notable series are coming to Binge?The Day of the Jackal – Nov 7Junior Taskmaster: S1 – Nov 9Dune: Prophecy – Nov 18Housewives of Beverly Hills: S14 – Nov 20Based on a True Story: S2 – Nov 21Outlander S7 – Nov 23Sign up for a free 14–day Binge trialBack to topNew in October on NetflixTV litter pick: Arcane: S2 – Nov 9 : The origins of two iconic League champions, set in the utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun.Movie litter pick: Dune: Part Two – Nov 29 : Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. html:
The must-watches on Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video, Apple TV+, Stan and Binge!

Somehow, it's already November. This means you and I are short-time for two things—hopefully, an abundance of time off to watch TV and an influx of cheesy Christmas Specials. Beyond my hopes for seasonal cheeziness, I'm just going to do what I always do—hook you up with every single critically acclaimed film, addictive TV series, and surprisingly awesome original content worth watching. Below are the top picks from thousands of hours of content from Australia's six major streaming networks. Make your plans. Pop your corn. Enjoy peak binge action.

Table of Contents

  • Foxtel/Binge
  • Netflix
  • Disney+
  • Apple TV+
  • Amazon Prime Video
  • Stan

New in October on Foxtel and Binge

TV litter pick: The Day of the Jackal – Nov 7 : In the 1960s in France, members of the French Foreign Legion hire a man who agrees to kill the heavily guarded President Charles de Gaulle for gain. The French cops sniff around to nab him.

Movie litter pick: Abigail – Nov 10 : A group of would-be criminals kidnaps the 12-year-old daughter of a powerful underworld figure. Holding her for ransom in an isolated mansion, their plan starts to unravel when they discover their young captive is something else.

What notable movies are coming to Binge?

  • Golda – Nov 1
  • Abigail – Nov 10
  • Surveilled – Nov 21
  • The Fall Guy – Nov 30

What notable series are coming to Binge?

  • The Day of the Jackal – Nov 7
  • Junior Taskmaster: S1 – Nov 9
  • Dune: Prophecy – Nov 18
  • Housewives of Beverly Hills: S14 – Nov 20
  • Based on a True Story: S2 – Nov 21
  • Outlander S7 – Nov 23

Sign up for a free 14–day Binge trial

Back to top

New in October on Netflix

TV litter pick: Arcane: S2 – Nov 9 : The origins of two iconic League champions, set in the utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun.

Movie litter pick: Dune: Part Two – Nov 29 : Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

What notable movies are coming to Netflix?

  • Hidden Figures – Nov 1
  • Warm Bodies – Nov 1
  • Alita: Battle Angel – Nov 8
  • Abigail – Nov 10
  • D&D: Honor Among Thieves – Nov 12
  • Ready or Not – Nov 15
  • John Wick: Chapter 4 – Nov 22
  • Dune: Part Two – Nov 29
  • Mononoke The Movie – Nov 31

What notable series are coming to Netflix?

  • Outer Banks: S4 – Nov 7
  • Countdown: Paul vs. Tyson – Nov 7
  • The Resident: S6 – Nov 8
  • Arcane: S2 – Nov 9
  • A Man on the Inside – Nov 21
  • Cobra Kai: S6 – Nov 15
  • The Empress: S2 – Nov 22
  • Is it Cake? Holiday – Nov 28

Secure your subscription to Netflix

Back to top

New in October on Disney+

TV litter pick: Interior Chinatown – Nov 19 : A background character trapped in a police procedural discovers secrets about the strange world he inhabits and his family's buried history; based on the novel.

Movie litter pick: Music by John Williams – Nov 1 : A doco about the composer of (among many others) the Star Wars series, the Indiana Jones series, and E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.

What notable movies are coming to Disney+?

  • Music by John Williams – Nov 1
  • Endurance – Nov 2
  • An Almost Christmas Story – Nov 15
  • Out of My Mind – Nov 22
  • Jim Gaffigan: The Skinny – Nov 22

What notable series are coming to Disney+?

  • FX's Say Nothing – Nov 14
  • Interior Chinatown – Nov 19
  • Beatles ’64 – Nov 29

Sign up for Disney Plus

Back to top

New in October on Apple TV+

TV litter pick: Silo: S2 – Nov 15 : In a ruined and toxic future, a community exists in a giant underground silo that plunges hundreds of stories deep; there, people live in a society full of regulations they believe are meant to protect them.

Movie litter pick: Blitz – Nov 22 : In World War II London, nine-year-old George is evacuated to the countryside by his mother, Rita, to escape the bombings. Defiant and determined to return to his family, George embarks on a journey back home as Rita searches for him.

What notable movies are on Apple TV+?

  • Blitz – Nov 22
  • Bread & Roses – Nov 22

What notable series are coming to Apple TV+?

  • Bad Sisters: S2 – Nov 13
  • Silo: S2 – Nov 15

Sign up for a free 7–day trial of Apple TV+

Back to top

New in October on Amazon Prime Video

TV litter pick: Cross – Nov 14 : Alex Cross, a decorated D.C. homicide detective and forensic psychologist faces a sadistic serial killer; he and his partner, John Sampson track this killer and a threat from Cross' past appears with ill intent.

Movie litter pick: Civil War – Nov 29 : In a dystopian future America, a team of military-embedded journalists races against time to reach Washington, D.C., before rebel factions descend upon the White House.

What notable movies are coming to Prime Video?

  • Borderlands – Nov 1
  • My Old Ass – Nov 7
  • Pimpinero: Blood and Oil – Nov 22
  • Civil War – Nov 29

What notable series are coming to Prime Video?

  • Citadel: Honey Bunny – Nov 7
  • In Cold Water: The Shelter Bay Mystery – Nov 12
  • Cross – Nov 14
  • Cruel Intentions – Nov 21

Sign up for a free 30–day Prime Video trial

Back to top

New in October on Stan

TV litter pick: Yellowstone: S5 – Nov 11 : You know the deal and the addiction. The Duttons own the largest ranch in America and deal with their internal conflicts. However, they must also fend off land encroachers to protect their property.

Movie litter pick: X – Nov 15 : A filmmaking crew and the cast make an adult movie at a reclusive place but elderly hosts find them and try to kill them.

What notable movies are coming to Stan?

  • Kung Fu Panda – Nov 1
  • Kung Fu Panda 3 – Nov 1
  • Last Christmas – Nov 1
  • Revealed: Bribe Inc. – Nov 3
  • The Notebook – Nov 3
  • The Mountain – Nov 9
  • Dawn Of The Planet Of The Apes – Nov 9
  • Rise Of The Planet Of The Apes – Nov 9
  • Raging Bull – Nov 14
  • X – Nov 15
  • Parasite – Nov 16

What notable series are coming to Stan?

  • Drag Race Down Under: S4 – Nov 1
  • Ghosts: S5 – Nov 1
  • The Resident: S6 – Nov 8
  • Yellowstone: S5 – Nov 11
  • Hunters: S1 – Nov 28

Score your free 30–day trial of Stan

Back to top
